feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Fiori
feed.subtitle: SAP Fiori Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Adding 'Equals' Option to Selection Field in Fiori App
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I'm seeking your guidance on how to enable the 'equals' option in the Selection field/Filter of a Fiori app.

I've already added the relevant annotations in the Metadata extension, but the 'equal to' option is not appearing in the list of available filter operators.

 

Example The below field is having 'equal to' as one of the list of values

 

Appreciate your inputs.

Thanks,

Mukhtar

entry.title: Issue with CDS Join for SD & FI Documents for Custom IRN RAP Application
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

I am working on a custom RAP based Fiori Elements Application for IRN and E-Way Bill Generation. Currently, we generate the IRN using the SD Document Type based on the CDS view I_BillingDocumentBasic.

As per the new requirement, we also need to include FI Documents, so we are using the CDS view I_JournalEntryItem. Our objective is to retrieve DG and DR documents using a UNION ALL, but we are facing an issue where some required fields are not appearing. I have attached a Code of the CDS view which we have  Developed.

Could anyone guide us on what might be causing the join issue or how we can achieve this requirement in our custom IRN application?

We have created two CDS views one is a join of the FI and SD document CDS views, and the another is the Backend CDS view used for IRN Generation where we fetch the Document Type.

Please find the attached First CDS view which has Join logic for both the SD and FI Document CDS views.

@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Billing and FICO Document Type Join'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define view entity ZI_INV_FI_DOC_JOIN
  as select from I_BillingDocumentBasic     as VBRK

    inner join   I_BillingDocumentItemBasic as VBRP on VBRK.BillingDocument = VBRP.BillingDocument
{
  key VBRK.BillingDocument         as BillingDocument,
  key VBRP.BillingDocumentItem     as BillingDocumentItem,
      VBRK.CompanyCode             as CompanyCode,
      VBRK.BillingDocumentType     as BillingDocumentType,
      VBRK.AccountingExchangeRate  as AccountingExchangeRate,
      VBRK.DocumentReferenceID     as DocumentReferenceID,
      VBRK.BillingDocumentDate     as BillingDocumentDate,
      VBRK.CreationDate            as CreationDate,
      VBRK.PayerParty              as Customer,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      VBRK.TotalNetAmount          as TotalNetAmount,
      VBRK.TransactionCurrency     as TransactionCurrency,
      VBRP.Plant                   as Plant,
      VBRP.ReferenceSDDocument     as ReferenceSDDocument,
      VBRP.ReferenceSDDocumentItem as ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
      VBRP.Material                as Material,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'BillingQuantityUnit'
      VBRP.BillingQuantity         as BillingQuantity,
      VBRP.BillingQuantityUnit     as BillingQuantityUnit,
      VBRP.BaseUnit                as BaseUnit,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      VBRP.NetAmount               as NetAmount
}
union all select from I_JournalEntry     as BKPF
  inner join          I_JournalEntryItem as ACDOCA on BKPF.AccountingDocument = ACDOCA.AccountingDocument
{
  key BKPF.AccountingDocument                             as BillingDocument,
  key cast(ACDOCA.AccountingDocumentItem as abap.char(6)) as BillingDocumentItem,
      BKPF.CompanyCode                                    as CompanyCode,
      BKPF.AccountingDocumentType                         as BillingDocumentType,
      BKPF.ExchangeRate                                   as AccountingExchangeRate,
      BKPF.DocumentReferenceID                            as DocumentReferenceID,
      BKPF. PostingDate                                   as BillingDocumentDate,
      ACDOCA.CreationDate                                 as CreationDate,
      ACDOCA.Customer                                     as Customer,
      ACDOCA.AmountInTransactionCurrency                  as TotalNetAmount,
      ACDOCA.TransactionCurrency                          as TransactionCurrency,
      ACDOCA.Plant                                        as Plant,
      BKPF.DocumentReferenceID                            as ReferenceSDDocument,
      ACDOCA.SourceReferenceDocumentItem                  as ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
      ACDOCA.Product                                      as Material,
      ACDOCA.Quantity                                     as BillingQuantity,
      ACDOCA.ReferenceQuantityUnit                        as BillingQuantityUnit,
      ACDOCA.BaseUnit                                     as BaseUnit,
      ACDOCA.AmountInTransactionCurrency                  as NetAmount
}

 

Here is the another CDS view where we are using this CDS view in the background for fetching the Document Type of SD & FI.

 

@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'view entity to pick Invoice number'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define root view entity ZBR_INV_EDOC_PICK
       with parameters
       iv_fkdat : abap.dats
  as select from    ZI_INV_FI_DOC_JOIN            as _VBRK_BKPF

    left outer join I_ProductText                 as MAKT      on MAKT.Product = _VBRK_BKPF.Material
    left outer join I_Plant                       as t001w     on t001w.Plant = _VBRK_BKPF.Plant
    inner join      I_Customer                    as KNA1      on KNA1.Customer = _VBRK_BKPF.Customer
  
    inner join      ZR_EDOC_TYPE                  as EIDOCTYPE on  EIDOCTYPE.CompanyCode = _VBRK_BKPF.CompanyCode
                                                               and EIDOCTYPE.BillingType = _VBRK_BKPF.BillingDocumentType
  
    inner join      I_ProductPlantBasic           as marc      on  marc.Product = _VBRK_BKPF.Material
                                                               and marc.Plant   = _VBRK_BKPF.Plant
    inner join      I_CompanyCode                 as t001      on t001.CompanyCode = _VBRK_BKPF.CompanyCode
    left outer join I_IN_PlantBusinessPlaceDetail as PBplace   on  PBplace.Plant       = _VBRK_BKPF.Plant
                                                               and PBplace.CompanyCode = _VBRK_BKPF.CompanyCode
    left outer join I_IN_BusinessPlaceTaxDetail   as BBRANCH   on  BBRANCH.CompanyCode   = _VBRK_BKPF.CompanyCode
                                                               and BBRANCH.BusinessPlace = PBplace.BusinessPlace

  association [0..1] to I_Currency      as _TransactionCurrency on $projection.TransactionCurrency = _TransactionCurrency.Currency
  association [0..1] to I_UnitOfMeasure as _BillingQuantityUnit on $projection.BillingQuantityUnit = _BillingQuantityUnit.UnitOfMeasure
{
  key  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingDocument,
  key  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingDocumentItem,
       _VBRK_BKPF.CompanyCode,
       _VBRK_BKPF.BillingDocumentType,
       _VBRK_BKPF.AccountingExchangeRate,
       _VBRK_BKPF.DocumentReferenceID,
       _VBRK_BKPF.BillingDocumentDate,
       _VBRK_BKPF.CreationDate,
       @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
       _VBRK_BKPF.TotalNetAmount,
       @ObjectModel.foreignKey.association: '_TransactionCurrency'
       _VBRK_BKPF.TransactionCurrency,
       _VBRK_BKPF.Plant,
       _VBRK_BKPF.ReferenceSDDocument,
       _VBRK_BKPF.ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
       _VBRK_BKPF.Material,
       PBplace.BusinessPlace,
       MAKT.ProductName,
       @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'BillingQuantityUnit'
       _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantity,
       @ObjectModel.foreignKey.association: '_BillingQuantityUnit'
       _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit,
       _VBRK_BKPF.BaseUnit,
       @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
       _VBRK_BKPF.NetAmount,

       LIKP.DeliveryDocument,
       LIKP.ShipToParty,
       LIKP._ShipToParty.BPCustomerName                                                                                                                                             as LBPCustomerName,
       LIKP._ShipToParty.TaxNumber3                                                                                                                                                 as LTaxNumber3,
       LIKP._ShipToParty._AddressDefaultRepresentation.CityName                                                                                                                     as LCityName,
       LIKP._ShipToParty._AddressDefaultRepresentation.DistrictName                                                                                                                 as LDistrictName,
       LIKP._ShipToParty._AddressDefaultRepresentation.PostalCode                                                                                                                   as LPostalCode,
       LIKP._ShipToParty._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetName                                                                                                                   as LCStreetName,
       LIKP._ShipToParty._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetPrefixName1                                                                                                            as LCStreetPrefixName1,
       LIKP._ShipToParty._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetPrefixName2                                                                                                            as LCStreetPrefixName2,
       LIKP._ShipToParty._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetSuffixName1                                                                                                            as LCStreetSuffixName1,
       t001w.PlantName,
       t001w.AddressID                                                                                                                                                              as PAddressID,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.AddresseeFullName,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.StreetName,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.CityName,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.DistrictName,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.PostalCode,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.StreetPrefixName1,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.StreetPrefixName2,
       t001w._StandardOrganizationAddress.StreetSuffixName1,
       BBRANCH.IN_GSTIdentificationNumber,
       KNA1.Customer,
       KNA1.BPCustomerName,
       KNA1.AddressID                                                                                                                                                               as CAddressID,
       KNA1.TaxNumber3                                                                                                                                                              as CTaxNumber3,
       KNA1._AddressDefaultRepresentation.CityName                                                                                                                                  as CCityName,
       KNA1._AddressDefaultRepresentation.DistrictName                                                                                                                              as CDistrictName,
       KNA1._AddressDefaultRepresentation.PostalCode                                                                                                                                as CPostalCode,
       KNA1._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetName                                                                                                                                as CStreetName,
       KNA1._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetPrefixName1                                                                                                                         as CStreetPrefixName1,
       KNA1._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetPrefixName2                                                                                                                         as CStreetPrefixName2,
       KNA1._AddressDefaultRepresentation.StreetSuffixName1                                                                                                                         as CStreetSuffixName1,
       t001.CompanyCodeName,
       t001.AddressID                                                                                                                                                               as CCAddressID,
       t001._OrgAddressDefaultRprstn.CityName                                                                                                                                       as CCCityName,
       t001._OrgAddressDefaultRprstn.PostalCode                                                                                                                                     as CCPostalCode,
       t001._OrgAddressDefaultRprstn.StreetName                                                                                                                                     as CCStreetName,
       t001._OrgAddressDefaultRprstn.StreetPrefixName1                                                                                                                              as CCStreetPrefixName1,
       t001._OrgAddressDefaultRprstn.StreetPrefixName2                                                                                                                              as CCStreetPrefixName2,
       t001._OrgAddressDefaultRprstn.StreetSuffixName1                                                                                                                              as CCStreetSuffixName1,
       BBRANCH.IN_GSTIdentificationNumber                                                                                                                                           as CCGSTIN,
       EIDOCTYPE.BillingType,
       EIDOCTYPE.InvoiceType,
       EIDOCTYPE.IrnDocType,
       EIDOCTYPE.SupplyType,
       EIDOCTYPE.IrnApp,
       EIDOCTYPE.EwbApp,
       EIDOCTYPE.EwbDocType,
       EIDOCTYPE.ProcessType,

       _VBRK_BKPF.AccountingExchangeRate *  _VBRK_BKPF.AccountingExchangeRate                                                                                                       as exrate,
       @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
       cast ( cast (  _VBRK_BKPF.NetAmount as abap.dec( 15, 5 ) ) *  _VBRK_BKPF.AccountingExchangeRate as abap.curr(15,2) )                                                         as taxvalue,
       @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
       cast ( cast (  _VBRK_BKPF.NetAmount as abap.dec( 15, 5 ) ) *  _VBRK_BKPF.AccountingExchangeRate / cast( _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantity as abap.dec(13,5) )  as abap.curr(15,2 )) as unitprice,
       marc.ConsumptionTaxCtrlCode,
       case
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'kg'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit  = 'KG'
       then 'KGS'
       when _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'ea'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'EA'
       then 'NOS'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'pc'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'PC'
         or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'st'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'ST'
       then 'PCS'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'dr'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'DR'
       then 'DRM'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'ft2' or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'FT2'
       then 'SQF'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'g'   or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'G'
       then 'GMS'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'm2'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'M2'
       then 'SQM'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'm3'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'M3'
       then 'CBM'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'ml'  or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'ML'
       then 'MLT'
       when  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'paa' or  _VBRK_BKPF.BillingQuantityUnit = 'PAA'
       then 'PRS'
       else 'OTH'
       end                                                                                                                                                                          as zunit,
       _TransactionCurrency,
       _BillingQuantityUnit
}
where
  _VBRK_BKPF.CreationDate = $parameters.iv_fkdat

 

Thank you,

entry.title: Facing issue Related to Adding Chart to List Report Page Based on CAP CDS
entry.content:
Hi all,

I am Building the project using guided development and everything works good locally in BAS.

But after Deploying to BTP 

always "Start by providing your search or filter criteria" displayed

entry.title: How to remove the copy to clip board in a responsive smart table
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

I'm trying to remove the copy to clipboard button, without success even i tried to add it in my manifest.json

"tableSettings": { "disableCopyToClipboard": true, "enablePaste": false }

entry.title: @sap/fiori generation error in yeoman
entry.content:
Hi!
After executing yeoman with @SAP/fiori generator I get the following error on ubuntu 22.04:

The migration of the systems.json file from .fioritools to .saptools failed: ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/home/user/.fioritools/systems.json'

Yeoman crashes and stops the generation. What is the problem here? I already added empty systems.json, but this doesn't help. Whats the content of systems.json?

Thank you in advance!

BR
Ron

entry.title: HCM P&F/Fiori Start Processes for multiple employees or objects
entry.content:
I have been searching by I didn't find any information about the possibility to start a process for several employees in the App Start Processes. There is this option in the configuration of the process "M Enable Mass Start Process" but I guess it doesn't work in the App Start Process directly but in the WD app Mass Start Processes. Can someone confirm?

 

Thanks!

entry.title: Unable to authenticate backend system from SAP BAS via Cloud Connector – “Authentication incorrect”
entry.content:
Hello Experts!!

I am trying to consume an on-premise S/4HANA system from SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) using SAP Cloud Connector and a BTP Destination.

The Cloud Connector connection is reachable, and the Destination is visible inside BAS, but when I select the destination (“S4H”) in the SAP Fiori Generator wizard, BAS returns the error:


"Authentication incorrect. Please check the SAP BTP destination authentication configuration."

Even when I remove authentication from the BTP Destination and directly enter credentials in the BAS wizard, the same error appears.

I can successfully log in to the S/4HANA backend via SAP GUI with the same user and password, and the SAP Easy Access screen loads correctly.
However, BAS / Cloud Connector authentication fails.

entry.title: Redirect navigation to extended “Manage Central Purchase Contracts” app
entry.content:
Hello Experts, good day.

We are facing a peculiar situation and I would like to know if anyone has any ideas on how we could resolve it.

We created an extension of the standard Manage Central Purchase Contracts app. The change was developed in SAP BAS, and the deployment was successful. We also created a target mapping and a tile to use the new extended app. Up to this point, everything works fine, and all tests ran successfully.Target Mapping Inbound Navigation

However, we encountered another issue.

We noticed that a user is working with the Process Purchase Requisitions Centrally app, which includes an option to open the Manage Central Purchase Contracts app. What we need is for this navigation to open our extended app instead of the original standard one.

The problem is that we don’t know how to achieve this.
Do we need to extend the Process Purchase Requisitions Centrally app as well?
Or is there any way to adjust the target mapping or redirect the navigation without modifying that app?

We are honestly a bit lost on how this could be done, and any guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks
EBZ

entry.title: SAP RAP Fiori Freestyle Custom page cannot detect onExit
entry.content:
I'm currently working on an SAP RAP where the user can go from a List Report to a custom page. This custom page is using a Fiori Freestyle and it's mainly for filling in with custom data. I'm not using Form Entry Object Page because this is using custom entity and draft entity is not going to be used in this scenario.

The problem here is that if I were to provide input in the custom page, go back, and select another item, the data doesn't change. It stays the same and I don't know why. Does anyone have a solution to this problem?

entry.title: Manage Sales Order (Version 2) - Custom Sales Items Table
entry.content:
We have a requirement in the Manage SO Version 2 Fiori app which is of type SAP FIori Elements and based on a V4 OData service. We have made a Custom Sales Items Table similar to the one we have in the Object Page for Sales Items for some additional functionality. This table opens in a dialog via a Custom Action Button in the Object Page.

Now, when we are adding/ updating any data in this Custom Line items table which is also binded to the Odata model, it is not getting reflected back onto the Standard Line items table without pressing Save button or reload button of browser. We have tried to programatically refresh the Odata V4 model and the list binding as well of the standard line items table but it is not giving us the latest snapshot of the data when we are in Edit mode of the page. 

Has anyone done this kind of requirement before ? Or know how to refresh the object page in edit mode ?

entry.title: Use Microsoft Entra Id to Secure CAP Fiori Application
entry.content:
I have an HTML5 application developed using SAP Fiori and CAP for Node.js. An XSUAA instance was created for security, and the application uses the Build Work Zone Managed App Router.

I want users to be able to browse the app even if they don’t have a BTP account. However, if they are part of our Microsoft tenant, they should be able to access and use the site.

I’m not sure how to achieve this. Any suggestions or resources would be highly appreciated. Thanks.

entry.title: Custom tile type creation for OnPremise
entry.content:
Hi All, 

I want to create a tile on the FLP with the radial chart for status, similar to below snap.

I started working towards it, please find further details and my progress below and let me know if I am on the right path and how to resolve it further, any help here would be appreciated?

I am trying to create a custom tile type for FLP. 
My requirement is to show 2 radial charts side by side on the main tile of FLP.

Till now I have created an app in BAS with chip file, registered the chip file and got my custom tile type on the launchpad designer (/ui2/flpd_cust), here it is blank but when I select it, I get my radial charts. (PFB).

                    

Now, the issue I am facing is when I add this tile configuration, all the buttons are greyed out, I am getting only create button enable, so I am not able to see this tile on FLP. 
Also, I tried to implement BADI "/UI2/BADI_FDM_PUB_CUST_TILE", but still all the buttons are disabled. Any help here would be appreciated. 

PS: Documents and blogs referred:
Implementing a Custom Tile Type | SAP Help Portal
Parameters of Interface /UI2/IF_BADI_FDM_PUB_CUST_TILE | SAP Help Portal

SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA SAP Fiori Launchpad SAPUI5 #chip #custom tile type

entry.title: Fiori evaluation request is in status: In Submission
entry.content:
Hi experts,

Group-Based Evaluation Requests are stuck In Submission (Lifecycle Status Code - 02).  Recently we applied Client export/import. No newly created requests in Evaluate Suppliers app after that. RFC authorization is fined as per note 2634526. Here are some logs from SLG1

Hierarchy SUBCONTRACTING does not contain any data
Hierarchy does not contain any data
Message no. RH508

Metering information missing for:
Message no. /IWFND/CM_COS127

Backend Error Log
Hierarchy SUBCONTRACTING does not contain any data

Browser Console Log
Assertion failed: C_SuplrEvalRspEvaluateST is not a valid EntityType

Could you guide me with that? Thanks

entry.title: I want to develop a Fiori app using capm service
entry.content: I have a service created using CAP (Cloud Application Programming Model), and I want to develop a Fiori application that can be deployed on a public URL, accessible to anyone. I need to know which approach I should follow: using a Page Map (Fiori Elements) or creating a Custom Page Fiori app.

entry.title: General Recommendation of maximum number of apps / app descriptors in 1 technical catalog?
entry.content:
Hello,

We were working in the structuring of the fiori apps for S4hana 2023. We have 1 business catalog per business role.

When it comes to custom technical catalog for all custom apps, we are thinking of having just 1 technical catalog overall and distribute the apps from it to business catalogs. So our question is will this impact the Performance in anyways if 1 Technical catalog has 1000 of apps ? what is the recommendation from SAP for Technical Catalog Size and structuring? Can't find this information in any sap help portals. 

@Jocelyn_Dart 

 

Thanks,

RK

entry.title: Updates on ODATA V2 Deprecation
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have confusion on latest rumors' on stopping support for ODATA v2 from SAP. I am not really finding any SAP note on that to get clear idea. Can someone help me to get it and also do you have idea on below points?

  • If ODATA v2 support is going to stop then what will happen to old service/integrations done with non-sap systems after system upgrade?
  • Are ODATA services created through SEGW comes under ODATA v2?
  • If creating ODATA services is not recommended in SEGW then how same can be done in v4 version(may be following RAP Model)?(Any blog or documentation on creating READ, UPDATE, CREATE Operations in ODATA v4 same like how we were doing in SEGW?)

Thanks for your time in reading my queries, please drop ur comments.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: Remove Cards from General Ledger Overview Fiori App (F2445)
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I tried to hide the two cards “Recognized Revenue” and “Recognized Cost of Sales” in the General Ledger Overview (F2445) app using Adapt UI / Adaptation Project in BAS.

While I am able to hide these cards at runtime, they can still be re-enabled by users through the Manage Cards option.

I would like to remove these cards completely from the root configuration, so that they cannot be enabled again by end users.

However, the “Remove Card” option appears to be disabled, as shown in the attached screenshots.
Could you please help me understand:

entry.title: Do we need to scheudle a job for report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE to update shortages in Fiori Apps?
entry.content:
Dear Gurus,

While setting up MRP and the most relevant Fiori apps, I have come across an issue related to some Fiori apps (Monitor External Requirements, Manage External Requirements...).

After checking SAP note 3603703, I decided to run report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE and update entries and I got the Fiori apps showing the correct data.

However, I wanted to know if this was actually something we would need to schedule in the background? I was expecting the information to be fully synch in Fiori with S4HANA. Is it not the case or might have be missing some configurations or activations?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: value help dropdown itself to show an explicit <empty> option?
entry.content:
I am working with a Value Help based on the annotation:

{
    $Type: 'Common.ValueListParameterIn',
    InitialValueIsSignificant: true,
    LocalDataProperty: id,
    ValueListProperty: 'ID'
}

InitialValueIsSignificant = true works correctly — if the field is empty, the value help filters for id eq '' and returns the correct results.

However, I also need the value help dropdown itself to show an explicit <empty> option, so that the user can actively choose an empty/null value.

Is there a standard way (annotation, UI5 parameter, or OData approach) to include an explicit <empty> option in a Value Help dropdown for a ValueListParameterIn?

entry.title: Is there a User Guide available for the MDK-based “Report Incident” mobile app?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am currently working on a Mobile App Assessment project and evaluating the Report Incident mobile application built using SAP Mobile Development Kit (MDK). I already have the installation and implementation guide, but I am specifically looking for the User Guide that explains how end-users can operate the app.

Could you please confirm if such a User Guide exists and share the link or resource where I can find it?

 
Thank you in advance!
